lyrics:
24 contributorstranslationstürkçefalling behind lyricsverse 1
moved out to a new city

and all that i can finds

a sickly romance in the air

oh this can’t be right

chorus
cause the suns engaged to the sky
and my best friends found a new guy
i’m only getting older
ive never had a shoulder to cry on
someone to call mine
everybodys falling in love
and im falling behind

verse 2
touched the ocean fell right in
stepped outside and burned my skin
my life wont go my way
bossa nova in my room
hoped that ill find someone too
to love bеcause
see laufey liveget tickets as low as 53you might also likechorus
the suns engagеd to the sky
